text: "How Many More Years" is a 1951 debut single by Howlin' Wolf and was written by Ike Turner. It went to number 4 on the Billboard R&B; singles chart and its double-sided hit Moanin' at Midnight went to number 10 on the Billboard R&B; singles chart. == References == Category:1951 songs Category:Blues music Category:Debut singles Category:Howlin' Wolf songs
title: How Many More Years
